long_description: The double-wall, 4-season Mountain Hardwear Tangent 2 mountaineering tent stands up to howling winds and snow loads, thanks to Trident corners that add strength and stability without additional poles. Industry leading DAC Pressfit(TM) poles and Trident corners provide incredible strength and maximize interior space. DirectConnect points secure tent body, frame and fly at each guyout point for a solid connection between all 3 components. Tested in a rain room, you'll enjoy watertight construction with a fully taped fly, taped bathtub floor, welded corners and welded guy clip anchors. The Mountain Hardwear Tangent 2 Tent features mesh vents at the roof and doors for high and low cross-ventilation.
short_description: The double-wall, 4-season Mountain Hardwear Tangent 2 mountaineering tent stands up to howling winds and snow loads, thanks to Trident corners that add strength and stability without additional poles.
